---
title: "Heterogeneous Treatment Effects"
date: 2025-04-06
execute: 
    cache: true
---

```{r}
#| label: tbl-entry_year
#| tbl-cap: "RPD Effect: Heterogeneity over Entry Year"
#| layout-ncol: 1
#| tbl-subcap:
#|  - Entry Year 2014-2016
#|  - Entry Year 2010-2013
#| include: false

results <- tar_read(entry_year_results) |>
  clean_hate()

results |>
  filter(split == T) |>
  print_hate()

results |>
  filter(split == F) |>
  print_hate() |>
  footnote(
    general = str_c(fuzzy_rd_footnote, " Panel A shows the results for workers who entered the formal labor market between 2010 and 2013, while panel B shows the results for workers who entered between 2014 and 2016. Currencies are expressed in 2024 Mexican Pesos."),
    general_title = "Note:",
    threeparttable = T,
    escape = F,
    footnote_as_chunk = T
  )

```
